DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect ciclesonide versus fluticasone propionate versus placebo airway hyperresponsiveness hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal axis ( HPA axis ) . Treatment medication administer follow : ciclesonide fluticasone propionate inhale twice daily , use one two dose level . The study duration consist baseline period ( 4 6 week ) , five treatment period ( 9 day ) , washout period treatment ( 4 12 week ) . The study provide data safety tolerability ciclesonide .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Inhaled Ciclesonide Versus Fluticasone Propionate Patients With Mild Moderate Asthma ( 18 65 ) ( BY9010/M1-129 )
